title: Chinese Navy (PLAN) 60th anniversary sees PRC showcase naval might

content: From: ++http://www.navy.mil/view_single.asp?id=70905 090423-N-1251W-103 YELLOW SEA (April 23, 2009) Sailors assigned to the guided-missile destroyer USS Fitzgerald (DDG 62) man the rails and render honors to the People's Liberation Army Navy Luzhau-class guided-missile destroyer Shijiahuang (DDG 116) during the International Fleet Review. Fitzgerald and 21 warships from 15 nations took part in the review to help celebrate the 60th anniversary of the founding of the PLA Navy along with. (U.S. Navy photo by Mass Communication Specialist 2nd Class Matthew R. White/Released) This message has been edited. Last edited by: Canuck_Centaur, Fri 24 April 2009 08:05 PM
